mapper.select: select prefer_purpose from preference where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_activity (memberid, title, contentid, cat1, cat2, cat3, clicked_at) VALUES (#{memberid}, #{title}, #{contentid}, #{cat1}, #{cat2}, #{cat3}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT cat3, COUNT(*) AS clickCount FROM user_activity WHERE clicked_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY cat3 ORDER BY clickCount DESC LIMIT 1;
